entry.title: Dick bites. It's a problem.
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,326Chapters: 6/23Kudos: 140

Summary: Thanks to batsandbirdbrains (Tumblr) it's now my headcanon that Dick bit as Robin.This is a COLLECTION of oneshots, somewhat related around one thing: Dick bites.Mostly Mature for the biting and violence, though the last chapter is PWP (DickJay). “You bite strange men, you get the rinse,” Batman said. “That’s the rule.” Robin tried to twist away, but Batman levered Robin up onto his feet with one hand, the other aiming the peroxide at Robin’s mouth. Robin clamped his lips tight. Batman’s patience snapped. “Open,” he growled. “Now.”“Mh-mh!” Robin kicked, but Batman hoisted him higher, one hand under Robin’s armpit, the other holding his head in place.“You don’t want hepatitis.” Batman said, voice ticking up a notch.Robin stopped struggling, eyes wide. Batman saw the pause, and loosened his grip - only to make Robin wind out of his grip and start running. The man with the bitten arm moaned.“What the fuck is wrong with you?” he managed, voice thick with pain and shock.Robin deadlooped over him, baring his teeth in a wicked, blood-stained grin.“Don’t grab the Robin,” he said. “That’s the first lesson.” Fully written fic, upload every Wednesday and Sunday!

entry.title: My little Robin
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 113,328Chapters: 26/50Kudos: 206

Summary: After Robin got kidnapped, ages ago, for the ploy of a love sick Talia, for proposing to Bruce in their twisted way, she'd come to Dick, desperate, alone, pretending to be broken.Dick, just fired as Robin, with a replacement lined up, doesn't believe one word she says, until she starts being honest. Until he sees a way to handle his hurt feelings.Three years later, she's back. Not broken, not quite as desperate, and yet honest, again. Honest how she's afraid of her position as heir to the League, with an actual male heir around. Honest about her wish to get rid of said heir.Dick has no choice, not really. He has to take Damian in. It's his son, after all. Fic is fully written and will be uploaded chapter by chapter. Upload every Wednesday and Sunday. Which means this will be done... December 31st, if I do daily uploads in the Christmas weeks. It'll allow you to read the last chapter, which is set shortly after midnight, on New Year's Day, after midnight ;)

entry.title: Blind Faith
entry.summary:
Author: AxisMage

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 177,733Chapters: 27/?Kudos: 171

Summary: It's no one's fault but his own that Dick is sitting there now, cold and utterly miserable, and very close to freezing to death.It's no one's fault but his own that he let his heart and mind get away again. It's no one's fault but his own that he wanted for someone who couldn't and wouldn't be his, and Wally is right.Dick needs to get back to his life, start over and make new friends. That's all, nothing more and nothing less. Friends, Dick needs friends, and sadly (according to Wally), Krypto isn't enough.

entry.title: Livin' On A Prayer
entry.summary:
Author: argentiswomb

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,873Chapters: 1/15Kudos: 5

Summary: "Jason Todd and Richard Grayson are, as they said previously, vigilantes. Like Spider-Man, they keep the city safe and, from what we have gathered in the last two months, only one of them has access to magic or has enhanced abilities, which is Jason Todd. Again, as mentioned by Grayson before, Todd was the one who came into contact with our already known symbiote Venom, a high-risk subject if not handled properly."Spider-Man added some details on the handling of the symbiote, which read, and I quote: 'Unnaturally quick to bond with the host, responsive but strangely docile compared to my experience with the alien. Seems like the symbiote and the host have a proper balance in their presence, and it looks like Red Hood doesn't break a sweat in controlling when the alien is presenting outside his body.' End quote."Some eyes in the room widened in surprise while Jason felt a snort escaping him.'Doesn't break a sweat,' my ass.

entry.title: The Inheritance
entry.summary:
Author: HopelesslyObsessed

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,888Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 36

Summary: They had an agreement that for Jason's sake, she'd keep her distance. But when he dies a few weeks short of his sixteenth birthday, it becomes her biggest regret. So, what if he'd had a crush on her? If only she'd been there, maybe things wouldn't have ended so tragically.She shouldn't have ever set foot in Gotham again, but Bruce was going down a dark path, and they both needed Joker to pay for what he did. The clown remains elusive, and she can't deny that Bruce's violence is rubbing off on her. When they finally catch him, things don't end well for any of them, and she's driven further than Bludhaven in search of herself.It starts as a cover, a cathartic act to help her work through her emotions, but her pain runs deeper, and the only relief she finds is in another young mercenary, who has almost as much as her to hide, and a similar taste in red.
